notesStmt.note: Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Biblical readings and liturgical poems for Passover.

msItem.title: Fragments of parashayot and hafṭarot for Pesaḥ

collation.p: 7 quires: i4 (folios 1-4), ii8 (folios 5-12), iii3 (folios 13-15), iv8 (folios 16-23), v4 (folios 24-27), vi2 (folios 28-29), vii2 (30-[31]). No catchwords.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Sefardi square and semi cursive script, partially punctuated.
